name: calcikay
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calci kay
des:
Calci kay is designed for performing multiple calculations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication and also finding simple/compound interest with the given inputs. It calculates the output in more than four decimal places. 

Steps to run: 

1. Alexa open calci kay

2. please multiply two point seven and six point eight

Confirm the variables/values as asked by Alexa (integer and decimal parts)

3. calculate simple interest

Pass the principal, rate, time as asked by Alexa. 

When asked for principal, reply five hundred thousand
When asked for rate, reply seven point six. Pl. note rate should be upto point one decimal places
When asked for time in years, reply ten
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
